title: The Stone That Remembers
tagline: To know yourself, you must first forget who you were.
themes: The Classical Body as a Vessel for Forgetting

chapters.title: The Dance of the Flickering Walls

story: Write a chapter where the protagonist discovers a memory that isn't his own, carved into a piece of his uncle's stone collection.
Create a dialogue between the old keeper and a flickering figure from the wall, debating the ethics of memory erasure.
Describe a surreal 'marketplace' within the memory-labyrinth where identities are bartered and reshaped like antiquities.
Write a myth, in the classical Greek style, that explains the origin of the horn mask and its first wearer.
technical: Build an interactive map of the memory-house, where each room (Andron, courtyard, circular chamber) reveals a fragment of the narrative or a thematic stone when clicked.
Create a text generator that produces 'surrealist ekphrasis'—descriptions of impossible classical art—inspired by the plinth carving and flickering walls.

cover_prompt: A fragmented classical Greek statue of a woman, her marble form mid-transformation into swirling, liquid sand and forgotten memories, [Detailed Scene & Context: standing in a surreal archaeological dig site where the earth is made of layered, translucent strata revealing ghostly impressions of past lives and buried emotions, with artifacts of personal identity—a cracked mirror, a faded photograph, a child's toy—half-unearthed around her], [Artistic Style & Medium: in the atmospheric style of a metaphysical painting by Giorgio de Chirico blended with the symbolic surrealism of Remedios Varo, rendered in matte acrylic and textured impasto], [Composition & Camera: book cover framing, a centered and symmetrical composition viewed from a low-angle to emphasize the statue's monumental yet decaying presence against a vast, dreamlike sky], [Lighting & Color Palette: dramatic chiaroscuro lighting with a stark contrast between the cold, ethereal moonlight and the warm, glowing embers from within the earth's layers, using a palette of weathered marble white, archaeological ochre, deep umbra, and surreal azure], [Quality & Technical Enforcers: masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev].
